author: _0xuser
content:
As a suggestion for future releases: what about simply publishing a big checklist with all the tasks needed and update it from time to time?
People need to see progress, setting a date may not be a good idea, but just saying "it will be done when it's done" doesn't help. Having a public checklist  will allow to have something like "80% done" without the pressure of a date.

author: timbeiko
content: Checklist also makes it much more productive for people to argue about the requirements (i.e. do we actually need X to ship? Should we add Y? etc.). vs. discussing whether it will be 2020 or 2021
